item.title: Speed up Python Using Native Code
item.description:
Tips and Traps¶

  1. It is never a good idea to do pre-mature optimization. Always profile (please refer to Profile Performance of Python Applications and Python Profiler for JupyterLab Notebooks) your code before you optimize it. If you do decide to optimize you Python code, there are multiple approaches. First, think about whether you can improve your algorithm. Please refer to Python Performance Tips
